sahan hemita sajini lagata gihin sajinige urahisin allala eka athakin nikaten allala muna udata issuwa.anith athin sajinige mune kadulu pihidapu sahan katha kara "dan tikak man kiyana de ahanna.ow oya mage wayif nisa thamayi man mewa karanne.habayi yuthukamakata neweyi man oyata aadare nisa" sahange kathawata sajinige as loku wuna.sajinige mune wenasa dakala sahanta hiniyata hinawakuth giya "ow sajini..man aadareyi oyata.kiyaganna bari tharamatama.man eeka kiyanna mechchara parakku wunata samawenna.eeth kiyanna hadanna hama welawema kiyanna bari mokakdo badhawak danuna mata.man dan dannawa ee mage aadambarakama nisayi kiyaganna bari wune" sahan kiyaddi sajini balan hitiye pudumen.
